title: Timemachine Watchface
summary: This is a magic and functional watch face
description: This is a magic watch face. There are many easy-to-use features.★ Machine watch with ambient mode★ Multiple customization features ★ Adventurous spirit and exclusive design★ Multiple functions in small dials ★ Watch and Phone battery indicator★ Works for round and squared watchesWatch face customization options:- Weather unity: C or F- Time Block color customizaiton- Weather&Color Block color customization- Battery Block color customizationHow to access the customization settings:- Open Android Wear companion app- Select watch face in the selection- Then you will see a settings icon on top of the watch face - Press on the settings icon on top of watch picker - Now you can customize your watch faceSupported devices- Works on all Android Wear devices - Supports round (e.g. Moto 360 and LG G Watch R) and rectangular smartwatches (e.g. Samsung Gear Live and LG G Watch). - Does NOT work on Samsung Gear and smartwatches using other operating systemsIf you have some suggestion,you can follow our community:Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/groups/1676804045872482Google+:https://plus.google.com/106543864725528267317
descriptionHTML:
This is a magic watch face. There are many easy-to-use features.

★ Machine watch with ambient mode
★ Multiple customization features
★ Adventurous spirit and exclusive design
★ Multiple functions in small dials
★ Watch and Phone battery indicator
★ Works for round and squared watches

Watch face customization options:
- Weather unity: C or F
- Time Block color customizaiton
- Weather&Color Block color customization
- Battery Block color customization

How to access the customization settings:
- Open Android Wear companion app
- Select watch face in the selection
- Then you will see a settings icon on top of the watch face
- Press on the settings icon on top of watch picker
- Now you can customize your watch face

Supported devices
- Works on all Android Wear devices
- Supports round (e.g. Moto 360 and LG G Watch R) and rectangular smartwatches (e.g. Samsung Gear Live and LG G Watch).
- Does NOT work on Samsung Gear and smartwatches using other operating systems

If you have some suggestion,you can follow our community:
Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/groups/1676804045872482
Google+:https://plus.google.com/106543864725528267317
